title: Team-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program through High-Fidelity Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Simulation-Based Team Learning in Mobile BYOD Environments with High-Fidelity Scenarios Mimicking Real Clinical Settings to Cultivate Complex Decision-Making Skills

learning_goals: Improve teamwork-based patient assessment and intervention planning abilities in simulation environments (achieve 90% or higher)
Achieve 85% or higher accuracy in applying emergency response protocols using high-fidelity equipment
Cultivate self-reflection and team process improvement skills through team debriefings (at least twice per process)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
